content.raw: I picked a few of the easiest classes to get the ball rolling. There will be more pull requests that implement the rest of the API. I believe swig supports almost all of the c++ language. I'd have to go back to the swig documentation to find the breaking points, but I seem to remember that the breaking points are in highly exotic use cases of c++.
